items.summary: Update the existing "Uniform & Armor Variants by Rank" page to include a new section titled "II. Uniform & Armor Variants by Rank" and render the provided uniform/armor bullet lists for each of these ranks in order: High Conductor, Conductor, Paladin-Forgemaster, Paladin, Artificer, Knight-Ranger, Knight, Apprentice, Copper-Bearer.

On the same "Uniform & Armor Variants by Rank" page, add a new section titled "III. Copper Warâ€“Era Rank Structure" that includes the provided introductory sentence and a "New / Temporary Ranks" subsection rendering each of the provided war-era ranks with their bullet lists: War Conductor, Paladin-Breaker, Artificer-Prime, Signal Rangers, Copper Conscripts.
